医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AMG 133（maridebart 卡夫拉鲁肽）减肥药在早期试验中显示出希望AMG 133 是一种工程双特异性分子，在 1 期临床试验中表现出显着的体重减轻和良好的安全性，为肥胖症提供了一种有前途的新治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/AMG-133-(maridebart-cafraglutide)-weight-loss-drug-shows-promise-in-early-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/AMG-133-(maridebart-cafraglutide)-weight-loss-drug-shows-promise-in-early-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdf1864b-b526-4453-ac8c-961ef135077a Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:17:00 -0500 AMG 133 (maridebart cafraglutide) weight loss drug shows promise in early trial
研究追踪了新冠病毒在普通人群中的长期变化过程一般人群中的长期新冠肺炎轨迹显示出不同的恢复模式，随着时间的推移，部分患者的症状会出现改善、恶化或稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-tracks-long-COVIDs-shifting-course-in-general-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-tracks-long-COVIDs-shifting-course-in-general-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19cfffb5-81e2-4622-b79f-efa7e5c7f98e Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:01:00 -0500 Study tracks long COVID's shifting course in general population
吸烟会引发红细胞死亡，引发贫血和血液循环问题吸烟会显着增加自杀性红细胞死亡，可能导致贫血和微循环问题，尽管对整体红细胞指数没有不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Smoking-triggers-red-blood-cell-death-raise-anemia-and-circulation-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Smoking-triggers-red-blood-cell-death-raise-anemia-and-circulation-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dede091-da86-449d-8aa2-3023f420c21e Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:38:00 -0500 Smoking triggers red blood cell death, raising anemia and circulation concerns
美国年轻人的电子烟使用量攀升，大流行年份略有下降研究强调，从 2013 年到 2019 年，美国青少年的电子烟使用量显着增加，在大流行期间略有下降，但水平仍然很高，特别是在年龄较大的青少年和所有人口群体中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/E-香烟-use-among-US-youths-climbs-with-pandemic-years-showing-slight-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/E-香烟-use-among-US-youths-climbs-with-pandemic-years-showing-slight-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0469815-33ab-4aba-8788-fe638c403817 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 20:21:00 -0500 E-cigarette use among US youths climbs, with pandemic years showing slight decline
在大流行的医疗保健转变中，肝硬化患者面临着复杂的感染结果COVID-19 大流行对医疗保健系统的影响导致肝硬化患者的结果好坏参半，感染率稳定，但多重耐药菌 (MDRO) 感染有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Cirrosis-病人-face-mixed-infection-outcomes-amid-pandemic-healthcare-shifts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Cirrosis-病人-face-mixed-infection-outcomes-amid-pandemic-healthcare-shifts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60a5d736-cb3b-4380-97f3-27f52dc7bcea Wed, 07 Feb 2024 19:19:00 -0500 Cirrhosis patients face mixed infection outcomes amid pandemic healthcare shifts
研究发现，猎人是早期发现人畜共患疾病的关键实验游戏通过基于社区的报告揭示了猎人在人畜共患疾病监测中的重要作用，强调了增加参与和对报告激励措施的理解的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Hunters-key-to-early-detection-of-zoonotic-diseases-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Hunters-key-to-early-detection-of-zoonotic-diseases-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18f6ddf9-ac8e-4524-ae5f-5f67e000f756 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 19:08:00 -0500 Hunters key to early detection of zoonotic diseases, study finds
新评论：1.6% 的妇女和女孩患有使人衰弱的经前焦虑症根据一项新的全球研究综述，大约 1.6% 的妇女和女孩患有有症状的经前焦虑症 (PMDD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-review-1625-of-women-and-girls-have-debilitating-Premenstrual-Dysphoric-Disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-review-1625-of-women-and-girls-have-debilitating-Premenstrual-Dysphoric-Disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4610c7ec-2600-4ede-b713-b9fc3821b404 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 14:21:24 -0500 New review: 1.6% of women and girls have debilitating Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder
研究表明，天然材料是隐形眼镜的有效消毒剂​一项新研究表明，一种天然材料是全球数百万人佩戴的隐形眼镜的有效消毒剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Naturally-occurring-material-is-an- effective-disinfectant-for-contact-lenses-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Naturally-occurring-material-is-an-efficient-disinfectant-for-contact-lenses-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11a3fc80-4808-4a57-b5bb-3186b1aab62e Wed, 07 Feb 2024 14:12:25 -0500 Naturally-occurring material is an effective disinfectant for contact lenses, study suggests
移动中的线粒体：新发现可能彻底改变脑部疾病的治疗人类大脑是一个消耗身体所需能量近 20% 至 25% 的器官。神经元功能的高能量需求取决于每个神经元中线粒体（产生能量的细胞器）的运输和精确分布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Mitochondria-on-the-move-New-discovery-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-brain-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Mitochondria-on-the-move-New-discovery-could-revolutionize-treatment-of-brain-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cfcbf58-15d4-4dd1-8476-6a5bc5f55d9d Wed, 07 Feb 2024 14:08:56 -0500 Mitochondria on the move: New discovery could revolutionize treatment of brain diseases
气味刺激参与快速决策的特定脑细胞科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员发现，气味会刺激特定的脑细胞，这些细胞可能在快速做出“去、不去”决策中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Odors-stimulate-special-brain-cells-involved-in-rapid-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Odors-stimulate-special-brain-cells-involved-in-rapid-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a7658c6-80fe-4549-a6f8-95c4967987ef Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:40:38 -0500 Odors stimulate specific brain cells involved in rapid decision making
